'''1.21 Pre-Release 3''' (known as '''1.21-pre3''' in the [[launcher]]) is the third pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.21]], released on June 5, 2024,<ref>{{cite|url=https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/article/minecraft-1-21-pre-release-3|title=Minecraft 1.21 Pre-Release 3|date=June 5, 2024|website=Minecraft.net}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''[[Data pack]]'''
* The [[pack format]] version is now <code>48</code>.

'''[[Enchantment definition]]'''
* Renamed <code>replace_disc</code> [[Enchantment definition#Entity effects|entity effect type]] to <code>[[Enchantment definition#replace_disk|replace_disk]]</code>.

== Fixes ==
{{Fixes|fixedin=1.21 Pre-Release 3
|;old
|252817|Placing a [[map]] into an item frame and removing it does not remove the green player marker.
|267988|[[Tame]]d entities ignore their "{{cd|LookAtPlayerGoal}}" distance and look in the direction of their owners from any distance when being stood up.
|272194|Empty attribute modifiers lost during upgrade.
|272996|Using "{{cmd|execute in...}}" to switch dimensions causes the player to fall when flying.
|;dev
|271658|Wind Burst enchantment sometimes doesn't burst the player up.
|272565|Hanging leashed boats gain excessive upward momentum.
|272577|Summoning any entity with rotation causes it to be rotated incorrectly.
|272582|Mip-mapping not properly applied to [[moss carpet]].
|272661|[[Entities]] have incorrect rotations after loading or reloading a world.
|272772|Leashed boats' leashes disappear upon rejoining world.
|272789|Leashing a [[boat]] to a fence which already has a [[lead]] attached to it removes the existing lead rather than attaching the new one.
|272814|Entering an [[end gateway]] does not consistently grant the "[[Remote Getaway]]" advancement.
|;previous
|272798|Teleporting a leashed boat (with chest) or raft (with chest) to another dimension makes a ghost lead.
|272809|Placed boats/rafts no longer face the same direction as the player.
|272823|Wind charges incorrectly cause damage to the player.
|272827|Unleashing boats leashed to [[fence]]s via Use Item/Place Block drops the lead in [[Creative mode]].
|272843|Stepping up blocks while falling on the side of them can sometimes allow players to climb to normally unreachable heights.
|272854|Crash when entity is leashed by non-{{cd|LivingEntity}}.
|272870|{{cmd|execute on leasher}} does not work for leashed boats.
|272879|Entering an [[end portal]] makes the player face the entering direction rather than always facing west.
|272886|Maces incorrectly cause damage to the player.
|272901|Boats and rafts with chests cannot be leashed if they have a passenger.
